src:
Punya Lukaku dan Martinez, Inter Disarankan Beli Striker Lagi
01 Nov 2019, 09:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Duet Lautaro Martinez dan Romelu Lukaku sudah menunjukkan kombinasi yang bagus di Inter Milan. Kendati demikian, Antonio Cassano menilai Nerazzurri masih butuh setidaknya satu striker lagi.
Lukaku bergabung dengan Inter pada bursa transfer musim panas dari Manchester United. Kendati demikian, Lukaku langsung menunjukkan ketajamannya dengan Martinez.
Lukaku dan Martinez mencetak gol saat Inter bertandang ke Brescia, Rabu (30/10/2019) dini hari WIB. Dua gol itu membuat timnya menang dengan skor 2-1.
Bagi Lukaku dan Martinez, itu adalah gol ketujuh mereka pada awal musim ini. Torehan tersebut membuat La Beneamata mempunyai duet yang cukup produktif sejauh ini.
text:
Got Lukaku and Martinez, Inter Recommended to Buy More Strikers
Nov 1 2019, 09:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Duo Lautaro Martinez and Romelu Lukaku have shown a good combination at Inter Milan. However, Antonio Cassano believes the Nerazzurri still need at least one more striker.
Lukaku joined Inter in the summer transfer market from Manchester United. Nevertheless, Lukaku immediately showed his sharpness with Martinez.
Lukaku and Martinez scored when Inter traveled to Brescia on Wednesday (10/30/2019) early morning hrs. Two goals that made his team win with a score of 2-1.
For Lukaku and Martinez, it was their seventh goal at the start of the season. The incision makes La Beneamata have a quite productive duet so far.
